<a id="PinJoint2D"></a>

# PinJoint2D

**Inherits:** [Joint2D](Joint2D.md) **\<** [Node2D](Node2D.md) **\<** [CanvasItem](CanvasItem.md) **\<** [Node](Node.md) **\<** [Object](Object.md)

A physics joint that attaches two 2D physics bodies at a single point, allowing them to freely rotate.

<!-- classref-introduction-group -->

## Description

A physics joint that attaches two 2D physics bodies at a single point, allowing them to freely rotate. For example, a [RigidBody2D](RigidBody2D.md) can be attached to a [StaticBody2D](StaticBody2D.md) to create a pendulum or a seesaw.

<!-- classref-reftable-group -->

<!-- classref-descriptions-group -->

## Property Descriptions

<a id="PinJoint2D_property_angular_limit_enabled"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[bool](bool.md) **angular_limit_enabled** = `false` [ðŸ”—](#PinJoint2D_property_angular_limit_enabled)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_angular_limit_enabled**\ (\ value\: [bool](bool.md)\ )
- [bool](bool.md) **is_angular_limit_enabled**\ (\ )

If ``true``, the pin maximum and minimum rotation, defined by [angular_limit_lower](PinJoint2D.md#PinJoint2D_property_angular_limit_lower) and [angular_limit_upper](PinJoint2D.md#PinJoint2D_property_angular_limit_upper) are applied.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="PinJoint2D_property_angular_limit_lower"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[float](float.md) **angular_limit_lower** = `0.0` [ðŸ”—](#PinJoint2D_property_angular_limit_lower)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_angular_limit_lower**\ (\ value\: [float](float.md)\ )
- [float](float.md) **get_angular_limit_lower**\ (\ )

The minimum rotation. Only active if [angular_limit_enabled](PinJoint2D.md#PinJoint2D_property_angular_limit_enabled) is ``true``.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="PinJoint2D_property_angular_limit_upper"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[float](float.md) **angular_limit_upper** = `0.0` [ðŸ”—](#PinJoint2D_property_angular_limit_upper)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_angular_limit_upper**\ (\ value\: [float](float.md)\ )
- [float](float.md) **get_angular_limit_upper**\ (\ )

The maximum rotation. Only active if [angular_limit_enabled](PinJoint2D.md#PinJoint2D_property_angular_limit_enabled) is ``true``.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="PinJoint2D_property_motor_enabled"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[bool](bool.md) **motor_enabled** = `false` [ðŸ”—](#PinJoint2D_property_motor_enabled)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_motor_enabled**\ (\ value\: [bool](bool.md)\ )
- [bool](bool.md) **is_motor_enabled**\ (\ )

When activated, a motor turns the pin.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="PinJoint2D_property_motor_target_velocity"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[float](float.md) **motor_target_velocity** = `0.0` [ðŸ”—](#PinJoint2D_property_motor_target_velocity)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_motor_target_velocity**\ (\ value\: [float](float.md)\ )
- [float](float.md) **get_motor_target_velocity**\ (\ )

Target speed for the motor. In radians per second.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="PinJoint2D_property_softness"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[float](float.md) **softness** = `0.0` [ðŸ”—](#PinJoint2D_property_softness)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_softness**\ (\ value\: [float](float.md)\ )
- [float](float.md) **get_softness**\ (\ )

The higher this value, the more the bond to the pinned partner can flex.
